scripts.clean: npm run delete:build & npm run delete:lock & npm run delete:dependencies & npm run delete:zip & npm run delete:phpcs_error & npm run delete:playwright
scripts.setup: npm run clean & npm install --force && composer install && husky install && playwright install
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:js & npm run test:unit:php
scripts.test:e2e: npm run docker start && playwright test
scripts.test: npm run test:unit & npm run test:e2e
scripts.start: npm run delete:build && composer dump-autoload && wp-scripts start
scripts.build: npm run delete:build && composer dump-autoload -o &&  wp-scripts build
scripts.build:zip: npm run delete:zip && composer install --no-dev && npm run build && node ./bin/build.js && node ./bin/buildZip.js && composer install
